mapper.insert: INSERT INTO E_board (title, content, writer, addRegion, addCi, addGu) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{addRegion}, #{addCi}, #{addGu})
mapper.select: SELECT e.eno eno, e.title title, e.content content, e.writer writer, e.addRegion addRegion, e.addCi addCi, e.addGu addGu, e.regdate regdate, e.updatedate updateDate, f.fileName fileName, m.username writerName FROM E_board e LEFT JOIN E_board_file f ON e.eno = f.eno JOIN GH_User m ON e.writer = m.userid WHERE e.eno = #{eno}

SELECT e.eno eno, e.title title, e.content content, e.writer writer, e.addRegion addRegion, e.addCi addCi, e.addGu addGu, e.regdate regdate, e.updatedate updateDate, f.fileName fileName, m.username writerName FROM E_board e LEFT JOIN E_board_file f ON e.eno = f.eno JOIN GH_User m ON e.writer = m.userid ORDER BY eno DESC

SELECT e.eno eno, e.title title, e.content content, e.writer writer, e.addRegion addRegion, e.addCi addCi, e.addGu addGu, e.regdate regdate, e.updatedate updateDate, f.fileName fileName, m.username writerName FROM E_board e LEFT JOIN E_board_file f ON e.eno = f.eno JOIN GH_User m ON e.writer = m.userid ORDER BY e.eno DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{amount}
